H0.text: Solubility is the physical property that students are investigating by placing each of the three solid mixtures in liquid water.

H1.text: Conductivity is the physical property being tested by the students when they investigate the physical properties of three solid mixtures by placing each solid mixture in liquid water.

H2.text: Boiling point is the physical property that the students are testing by placing each of the three solid mixtures into liquid water.

H3.text: Melting point is the physical property that the students are testing by placing each of the three solid mixtures in liquid water.

A4.text: Solubility is a characteristic property used to describe substances and aid in their separation.
